item.title: Type the way you want
item.description: Get your message across in the language and style you want. Switching among over many Indian languages and input methods is as seamless as typing. Save it somewhere specific as we will be using it in the next step. More complete instructions are available at Install Hugo Step 2. Build the Docs Hugo has its own example site which happens to also be the documentation site you are reading right now.
